original_text: As for the tribes of Reuben and Gad, I gave them land from Gilead to the Arnon valley. The middle of the valley was the border of their land. Their land went as far as the Jabbok valley, which is the border of the Ammonites' land.
korean_text: 르우벤 자손과 갓 자손에게는 길르앗에서부터 아르논 골짜기까지 주었으되 그 골짜기의 중앙으로 지역을 정하였으니 곧 암몬 자손의 지역 얍복 강까지며

sentences.original_text: As for the tribes of Reuben and Gad
I gave them land from Gilead to the Arnon valley
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 길르앗에서 아르논 골짜기까지 땅을 주었고

sentences.original_text: The middle of the valley was the border of their land
sentences.korean_translation: 그 골짜기의 중간이 그들의 땅의 경계가 되었으며

sentences.original_text: Their land went as far as the Jabbok valley
which is the border of the Ammonites' land
